participant_1.name: Evelyn
participant_1.personality: Evelyn is a vibrant and spirited individual who embraces life with passion. She has a deep appreciation for the arts and enjoys the finer things in life, including wine and dancing.
participant_1.background: i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight. i am very strong for my age. i'm 100 years old. i feel like i might live forever.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Mark is a reflective and somewhat melancholy individual. He often feels weighed down by his past experiences and struggles to find joy in the present.
participant_2.background: my wife left me and took my children. i do not believe in god. i'm overweight and unhappy. i work at a nursing home. i spend most of my time on facebook when i'm not working.
